item.title: Prometheus integration with Redis Cloud
item.description: To collect and display metrics data from your databases, you can connect your Prometheus or Grafana server to your Redis Cloud subscription. Prometheus is an open source systems monitoring and alerting toolkit that can scrape metrics from different sources. Grafana is an open source metrics dashboard and graph editor that can process Prometheus data. Redis Cloud has an Prometheus compatible endpoint available in order to pull metrics. Prometheus needs to connect to the internal server on port 8070.
